title: Weatherwise
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, John Martin-Jones and Bern Gandy
brief_description: The weather affects man in every phase of his living. To learn what the weather will be, weather reports from all over the continent are sent to the Weather Bureau where they are plotted on to maps. From these a daily weather forecast is made.
